Cliff Drysdale has devoted over four decades of his life to promoting the advancement of the tennis culture including the founding and presidency of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP), a 30 year+ tenure as an ESPN tennis analyst, and the ownership of a tennis management company, Cliff Drysdale Tennis¬Æ Florida Tennis Camps for Adults Cliff Drysdale Tennis offers adult and youth tennis programs in the Florida Keys. Receive world-class tennis instruction from USPTA Certified coaching professionals. Programs include¬†Clinics and Private Lessons. For more information or to schedule a lesson or private clinic at our Florida tennis resort, please contact Patrick Castronovo by phone 305-743-7000 ext. 1571, or email P.castronovo@cliffdrysdale.com . Pickleball Clinic Schedule Weekly Adult Pickleball Clinics: Drop-in clinics are available Monday through Saturday from 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM, and Pickleball 101 is held on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM. Racquet rentals are available in two-hour increments for $10. Clinic Details: A different shot and strategy are worked on every day with drills and live ball games. All levels are welcome. The price is $50 and reservations are required. Please contact Patrick Castronovo by phone 305-743-7000 ext. 1571, or email P.castronovo@cliffdrysdale.com . RESERVE MEMBERSHIP Tennis facilities are accessible. For more information on accessibility, please see our Accessibility Statement . Group Clinics & Tournaments For your next corporate event or group outing, organize a friendly 3-hour tournament led by a Cliff Drysdale Pro. Alternatively, set up an engaging clinic that also serves as a team-building activity for players of all ages and skill levels. Learn more Private Lessons & Clinics Private lessons and clinics are available for both tennis and pickleball. Whether you're new to the sport or looking to enhance your technique, Hawks Cay's private sessions for up to four people promise a fun and engaging experience. Tennis Programs & Pricing Tennis 101 Designed for beginner adults, Tennis 101 is a class that will provide you with the basic skills and knowledge to move forward with confidence in our tennis program. This class is a great opportunity for those who have never played tennis before and are interested in a lifetime sport! Availability: Tuesday and Thursday, 11:00am - 12:00pm Rates: $50/clinic (Resort Guests) CONTACT Tennis Drill & Play Clinic Tennis Drill & Play Clinics are open clinics that consist of doubles based instruction, drills, fun games and live point play. Each day will consist of a different theme. These clinics are a great way to hit a lot of balls and improve your game! Availability: Monday- Saturday, 10:00am -11:00am Rates: $50/clinic (Resort Guests) CONTACT Pickleball 101 Our pickleball open clinics are a great way to improve and learn at the fastest growing sport in the country. Each of our clinics will feature a different theme with the drills and instruction based on that theme! Availability: Tuesday and Thursday, 12:00pm -1:00pm Rates: $50/clinic (Resort Guests) CONTACT Pickleball Drop In Clinic Our pickleball open clinics are a great way to improve and learn at the fastest growing sport in the country. Our clinics will each feature a different theme with the drills and instruction being based around that theme! Availability: Monday - Saturday, 9:00am - 10:00am Rates: $50/clinic (Resort Guests) CONTACT Private Tennis Lessons Elevate your game with personalized tennis instruction, where expert guidance transforms your skills into a winning edge on the court. Rates Per Hour: $125 per person for private $80 per person (for 2 people semi private) $65 per person for (3 people semi private) $50 per person for (4 people semi private) Private Pickleball Lessons Sharpen your pickleball prowess with tailored private lessons, where expert coaching helps you master every shot and strategy for a competitive edge on the court. Rates Per Hour: $125 for private $80 per person (for 2 people semi private) Previous Next Item 1 Patrick Castronovo Racquets Director For more information or to schedule a lesson or private clinic, contact Patrick Castronova, our Racquets Director. Email Call Us Tennis Resorts Online Hawks Cay Resort is proud to be featured with Silver Medal Status with Tennis Resorts Online as one of the best resort locations in the world. Thank you for visiting one of the thousands of Listings, Pages, and Posts which make up the Informational & Educational Directories of MarathonFlorida.com. Marathon Yacht Club is a great way to meet new people in the Marathon area. 305-743-6739 The Marathon Yacht Club, located in the heart of the Florida Keys, was founded in 1951. We have been part of the Florida Council of Yacht Clubs since 1983 and cater to boaters and non-boaters alike.  Our members enjoy activities such as socializing, dining, cruising (on land and water), fishing, parties, games, physical activities and more. Notifications Notifications How far is Marathon Florida from Key West and Key Largo Marathon, Florida is located in the middle of The Florida Keys and is referred to as ‚ÄòThe Heart of The Florida Keys‚Äù. The Islands of Marathon stretch from mile marker 47, which is on the north side of the 7 Mile Bridge , and mile marker 59 in Grassy Key . Mile marker 106 is the first mile marker after crossing the 18 mile stretch at Key Largo and entering the Keys.¬† Mile marker 0 is located in Key West . Where is Marathon, Florida in The Florida Keys? Marathon, Florida is located in the middle of The Florida Keys.  It is a city spread over Knight's Key, Boot Key, Key Vaca, Fat Deer Key, Long Point Key, Crawl Key and Grassy Key islands in the middle of the Florida Keys.  It is in the County of Monroe in Florida. What‚Äôs Happening in Marathon & the Surrounding Florida Keys? Marathon Florida is a City made up of 13 islands located in the middle of The Florida Keys, about 50 miles north of Key West and about 50 miles south of Key Largo. Marathon Florida Keys boasts some of the best boating activities anywhere, including diving, snorkeling, and deep-sea, reef, and flats fishing. Add waterfront restaurants to a list of amenities, and you have a perfect vacation destination. production@MarathonFlorida.com (305) 587-9830 What is it like living in Marathon, Florida Keys? Marathon Florida is situated in Monroe County, in the middle of the Florida Keys, equally between Key Largo and Key West.¬† Marathon is one of the best places to live or vacation in Florida . Living in Marathon offers residents a dense suburban feel and most residents own their homes. Marathon offers a lot of bars, restaurants, coffee shops and attractions including the Turtle Hospital, Crane Point, The Dolphin Research Center, and the iconic 7 Mile Bridge. The public schools in Marathon are highly rated. Vacation Rentals in Marathon , Florida offer everything one needs for a stress free family get-away.
